mapper.select: select tlal.* from t_link t right join t_link_access_logs tlal on t.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url where t.gid = #{param.gid} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.enable_status = '0' and tlal.create_time between CONCAT(#{param.startDate},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{param.endDate},' 23:59:59') order by tlal.create_time desc
